text: Futhi amaJuda athi amaKristu awanasisekelo (okuyiqiniso abami kukona) futhi namaKristu athi amaJuda awanasisekelo (okuyiqiniso abami kukona) kulesikhathi kepha bengabafundi bencwadi, ngokunjalo labo abangazi lutho basho okufana nalokho abakushoyo, uMvelinqangi uyobahlulela ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo kulokhu ababephikisana ngakho
